TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ButtonField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件中以按钮形式显示的字段。

span.span: Represents a field that is displayed as a button in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件（如 和 ）使用 类，为显示的每个记录显示一个按钮。The class is used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display a button for each record that is displayed. 根据使用该对象的数据绑定控件， 对象的显示方式有所不同。The object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如， 控件以列的形式显示 对象， 控件将其显示为一行。For example, the control displays a object as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 单击按钮字段中的按钮将引发父数据绑定控件的命令事件。Clicking a button in a button field raises the command event of the parent data-bound control. 通过为命令事件提供事件处理程序，可提供在单击命令按钮时要执行的自定义例程。You can provide a custom routine to perform when a command button is clicked by providing an event handler for the command event. > [!NOTE] > 控件引发 事件，而 控件引发 事件。The control raises the event, while the control raises the event. 若要确定引发命令事件的记录的索引，请使用传递到数据绑定控件的命令事件的事件参数的 属性。To determine the index of the record that raises the command event, use the property of the event argument that is passed to the command event for the data-bound control. 类将自动用适当的索引值填充 属性。The class automatically populates the property with the appropriate index value. 若要指定要显示的按钮类型，请使用 属性。To specify the type of button to display, use the property. 显示链接或命令按钮时，请使用 属性指定要在按钮中显示的标题。When displaying a link or command button, use the property to specify the caption to display in the buttons. > [!NOTE] > 如果设置了 "" 属性，则 中的所有按钮共享相同的标题。If you set the property, all buttons in a share the same caption. 或者，您可以将 对象绑定到数据源中的字段。Alternatively, you can bind the object to a field in a data source. 这允许您为 对象中的按钮显示不同的标题。This allows you to display different captions for the buttons in the object. 指定字段中的值用于按钮的文本标题。The values that are in the specified field are used for the text captions of the buttons. 设置 属性以将 对象绑定到数据源中的字段。Set the property to bind a object to a field in a data source. 显示图像按钮时，请使用 属性指定要为 对象中的按钮显示的图像。When displaying an image button, use the property to specify the image to display for the buttons in the object. > [!NOTE] > 对象中的所有按钮共享同一图像。All buttons in a object share the same image. 可以通过将 属性设置为 `false`，隐藏数据绑定控件中的 对象。You can hide a object in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 对象允许您自定义其页眉和页脚部分。The object allows you to customize its header and footer sections. 若要在页眉或页脚部分显示标题，请分别设置 "" 或 " 属性"。To display a caption in the header or footer section, set the or properties, respectively. 您可以通过设置 "" 属性来显示图像，而不是在页眉节中显示文本。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 若要隐藏 对象中的标头部分，请将 属性设置为 "`false`"。To hide the header section in a object, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 某些数据绑定控件（如 控件）只能显示或隐藏控件的整个标题部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 这些数据绑定控件不支持单个按钮字段的 属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual button field. 若要显示或隐藏数据绑定控件（如果可用）的整个标头部分，请使用控件的 `ShowHeader` 属性。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the `ShowHeader` property for the control. 还可以通过设置字段的不同部分的样式属性来自定义 对象（字体颜色、背景色等）的外观。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |Style 属性Style property|的样式设置The style settings for| |--------------------|----------------------------| ||的子 Web 服务器控件。The child Web server controls of the .| ||的页脚部分。The footer section of the .| ||的标头部分。The header section of the .| ||中的数据项。The data items in the .| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对象在 控件中显示命令按钮的列。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to display a column of command buttons in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/CS/buttonfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/VB/buttonfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 构造函数初始化 类的新实例。Use the constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 当向动态创建的数据绑定控件添加字段时，通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要将 对象动态添加到数据绑定控件，请创建新的 对象，设置其属性，然后将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To add a object dynamically to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the data-bound control. 例如，如果使用 控件，请将 对象添加到 集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 虽然您可以将字段动态添加到数据绑定控件，但应静态声明字段，然后根据需要显示或隐藏字段。Although you can add fields dynamically to a data-bound control, fields should be declared statically, and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有字段可减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all of your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField. #ctor 构造函数将 对象动态添加到 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField.#ctor constructor to add a object dynamically to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldCtor/CS/buttonfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldCtor/VB/buttonfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串表示当单击 对象中的按钮时要执行的操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that represents the action to perform when a button in a object is clicked.

value.span: 当单击 中的按钮时要执行的操作的名称。

span.span: The name of the action to perform when a button in the is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性将命令名称（如 `"Add"` 或 `"Remove"`）与 对象中的按钮相关联。Use the property to associate a command name, such as `"Add"` or `"Remove"`, with the buttons in the object. 可以将 属性设置为任何字符串，以标识单击命令按钮时要执行的操作。You can set the property to any string that identifies the action to perform when the command button is clicked. 然后，你可以在事件处理程序中以编程方式确定命令名称并执行适当的操作。You can then programmatically determine the command name in an event handler and perform the appropriate actions. > [!NOTE] > 对象中的所有按钮共享相同的命令名称。All buttons in a object share the same command name. 数据绑定控件识别某些命令名称并自动引发和处理控件的相应事件。Data-bound controls recognize certain command names and automatically raise and handle the appropriate events for the control. 识别以下命令名称：The following command names are recognized: - `"Cancel"` - `"Delete"` - `"Edit"` - `"Insert"` - `"New"` - `"Page"` - `"Select"` - `"Sort"` - `"Update"` 若要调用分页，请将 设置为 `"Page"`，并将包含 控件的 设置为 `"First"`、`"Last"`、`"Prev"`、`"Next"`或页码。To invoke paging, set the to `"Page"` and the of the contained control to `"First"`, `"Last"`, `"Prev"`, `"Next"`, or a page number. 但是，因为 控件的 始终是整数行索引， 控件不适用于调用分页。However, since the for a control is always the integer row index, a control is not suitable for invoking paging. 同样，可以通过将 设置为 `"Sort"`来调用排序， 控件的 属性始终是整数行索引。Similarly, while you can invoke sorting by setting the to `"Sort"`, the property for a control is always the integer row index. 出于此原因， 控件不适用于调用排序。For this reason, a control is not suitable for invoking sorting. 对于自定义命令名称（如 `"Add"` 和 `"Remove"`），需要编写事件代码来检查命令名称并执行某些自定义操作。For custom command names, such as `"Add"` and `"Remove"`, you need to write the event code to check the command name and perform some custom action. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > 每个数据绑定控件都不能识别所有的命令名称。Not all command names are recognized by every data-bound controls. 例如， 控件无法识别 `"New"`，且 控件无法识别 `"Select"`。For example, `"New"` is not recognized by the control and `"Select"` is not recognized by the control. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为 控件的 对象中的按钮指定命令名。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a command name for the buttons in a object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/CS/buttonfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/VB/buttonfieldvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Copies the properties of the current object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法， 方法使用此方法将当前 派生对象的属性复制到 方法创建的 对象。The method is a helper method that is used by the method to copy the properties of the current -derived object to the object that was created by the method.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 方法时，调用基类的 方法以确保复制对象的所有属性。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, call the method of the base class to ensure that all properties of the object are copied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，该方法由基类的 方法用来创建一个空的 对象，以将当前 派生对象的属性复制到该对象。The method is a helper method that is used by the method of the base class to create an empty object to which to copy the properties of the current -derived object.

summary.span: 获取或设置数据字段的名称，该数据字段的值绑定到 控件的 属性，此控件由 对象呈现。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data field for which the value is bound to the property of the control that is rendered by the object.

value.span: 要绑定到 的字段名称。

span.span: The name of the field to bind to the .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 对象的 属性设置为 或 值时，请使用 属性指定要绑定到 对象的字段名称。When the property of a object is set to the or value, use the property to specify the name of the field to bind to the object. 然后，该字段的值将显示为 对象中按钮的文本。The values of the field are then displayed as the text for the buttons in the object. 还可以通过设置 "" 属性来设置显示的文本的格式。Optionally, you can format the displayed text by setting the property. 您可以使用 属性为 对象中的按钮文本显示静态文本，而不是使用 属性将 对象绑定到数据源中的字段。Instead of using the property to bind a object to a field from a data source, you can use the property to display static text for the text of the buttons in the object. 使用 属性时，每个按钮将共享同一标题。When the property is used, each button shares the same caption. > [!NOTE] > 如果同时设置了 "" 和 "" 属性， 属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定要在 控件的 列中显示的字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which field to display in a column of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/CS/buttonfielddatatextfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/VB/buttonfielddatatextfieldvb.aspx#1)]

public: virtual property System::String ^ DataTextFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataTextFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置字符串，该字符串指定字段值的显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 指定字段值显示格式的格式字符串。

span.span: A format string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚无特殊格式设置应用于该字段值。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为 对象中显示的值指定自定义的显示格式。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values that are displayed in the object. 如果未设置 "" 属性，则将显示字段的值而不进行任何特殊格式设置。If the property is not set, the value for the field is displayed without any special formatting. > [!NOTE] > 仅当设置了 属性时才应用格式字符串。The format string is applied only when the property is set. 格式字符串可以是任何文本字符串，并且通常包含字段值的占位符。The format string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the value for the field. 例如，在格式字符串 `"Item Value: {0}"`中，当字段显示在 对象中时，`{0}` 占位符替换为该字段的值。For example, in the format string `"Item Value: {0}"`, the `{0}` placeholder is replaced with the value for the field when it is displayed in the object. 格式字符串的其余部分显示为文本文本。The rest of the format string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式字符串不包含占位符，则数据源中的字段值不包含在最终的显示文本中。If the format string does not include a placeholder, the value for the field from the data source is not included in the final display text. 占位符由两部分组成，用冒号分隔并括在大括号中，格式为 {`A`： `Bxx`}。The placeholder consists of two parts, separated by a colon and wrapped in braces, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 冒号前面的值（在常规示例中为`A`）指定从零开始的参数列表中的字段值的索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the index for the field value in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此 `A` 参数是格式设置语法的一部分。This `A` parameter is part of the formatting syntax. 由于每个单元格中只有一个字段值，因此此值只能设置为0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, this value can only be set to 0. 冒号和冒号后的值是可选的。The colon and the values after the colon are optional. 冒号后面的字符（在常规示例中为`B`）指定值的显示格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format in which to display the value. 下表列出了常见格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|显示采用科学（指数）格式的数字值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|以固定格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|以数字格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 除 `X`以外，格式字符不区分大小写。Except for `X`, the format characters are not case sensitive. `X` 格式字符在指定的情况下显示十六进制字符。The `X` format character displays the hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified. 格式字符后的值（在常规示例中为`xx`）指定要显示的有效位数或小数位数。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 例如，格式字符串 `"{0:F2}"` 显示具有两个小数位的固定点数字。For example, the format string `"{0:F2}"` displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为字段值指定自定义的显示格式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom display format for the values of a field. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/CS/buttonfielddatatextfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldDataTextField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldDataTextField/VB/buttonfielddatatextfieldvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 扩展 类时，可以重写 方法，以执行自定义格式设置例程。

span.span: When extending the class, you can override the method to perform a custom formatting routine.

summary.span: 获取或设置要为 对象中每个按钮显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display for each button in the object.

value.span: 要为 中每个按钮显示的图像。

span.span: The image to display for each button in the .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 对象的 属性设置为 值时，请使用 属性指定要为每个按钮显示的图像。When the property of a object is set to the value, use the property to specify the image to display for each button. 此图像可以是任何文件格式（.jpg、.gif、.bmp 等等），只要客户端浏览器支持该格式即可。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为 对象中的每个按钮指定要显示的图像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an image to display for each button in the object. 若要显示此代码示例，必须提供自己的映像。For this code example to display, you must provide your own image. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonFieldImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldImageUrl/CS/buttonfieldimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonFieldImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonFieldImageUrl/VB/buttonfieldimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Initialize (bool sortingEnabled, System.Web.UI.Control control);

param.name: sortingEnabled
param.span: 如果启用排序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to enable sorting; otherwise, .
The data control that owns the .

summary.span: 初始化当前的 对象。

span.span: Initializes the current object.

returns.span: ，指示控件无需重新绑定到数据。

span.span: , which indicates the control does not need to rebind to the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由与 对象关联的数据控件调用，以便为该字段的实例执行基本对象初始化，然后将该字段添加到行集合中。The method is called by the data control with which the object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a rows collection. 数据控件（如 和 ）将调用其他方法（如 `CreateRow`）来创建具有数据的特定行，然后在其 `CreateChildControls` 方法中调用 方法。Data controls, such as and , call the method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods, such as `CreateRow`, are called to create specific rows with data. 编写自定义数据绑定控件时调用 方法，该控件使用 对象为 对象执行基本初始化。Call The method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to perform basic initialization for a object. 如果 派生类型在用 方法中的数据或控件填充 对象之前需要初始化对象，则实现此方法。Implement this method if your -derived type requires any object initialization before it populates objects with data or controls in the method.

para.span: 如果字段要求在回发时执行数据绑定，则应重写 方法，并返回 。

span.span: You should override the method and return , if the field requires that data binding be performed on postback in order for the field to work correctly.

One of the values.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象初始化为指定的行状态。

span.span: Initializes the specified object to the specified row state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建由 属性指定的按钮类型，并将其添加到 对象的 集合。The method creates the button type that is specified by the property and adds it to the collection of the object. 控件的 属性设置为 `rowIndex`。The property of the control is set to `rowIndex`.

.property instance string Text
Public Overridable Property Text As String

member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为 对象中每个按钮显示的静态标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the static caption that is displayed for each button in the object.

value.span: 为 中每个按钮显示的标题。

span.span: The caption displayed for each button in the .
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 对象的 属性设置为 或 值时，请使用 属性来显示 中按钮标题的静态文本。When the property of a object is set to the or value, use the property to display static text for the caption of the buttons in the . 每个按钮共用相同的标题。Each button shares the same caption. 您可以使用 属性将 绑定到数据源中的字段，而不是使用 属性显示 对象中的静态文本。Instead of using the property to display static text in a object, you can use the property to bind the to a field in a data source. 然后，该字段的值将显示为按钮的标题。The values of the field are then displayed as the caption of the buttons. > [!NOTE] > 如果同时设置了 "" 和 "" 属性， 属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定要为 对象中的每个按钮显示的标题。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption to display for each button in a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/CS/buttonfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonField/VB/buttonfieldvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void ValidateSupportsCallback ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateSupportsCallback() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ValidateSupportsCallback ()
public: override void ValidateSupportsCallback();
override this.ValidateSupportsCallback : unit -> unit

summary.span: 确定包含在 对象中的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Determines whether the controls that are contained in a object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于确定包含在 对象中的控件是否支持回调。The method is a helper method that is used to determine whether the controls that are contained in a object support callbacks. 此方法实现为空方法（不包含任何代码的方法）以指示支持回调。This method is implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported. > [!NOTE] > 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers.

para.span: 从 类派生的类可以重写 方法，以指示字段包含的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override the method to indicate whether the controls that are contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指示支持回调，请将 方法实现为空方法，该方法不会引发异常;否则，将引发异常，并提供有用的消息，说明不支持回调的原因。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement the method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
